title: Oh Dog! You Sleuth! Portland Map
name: Oh Dog! You Sleuth! Portland Map
description:
A Map by Scottysouling

Locations of photos from http://ohdog.org

properties.name: April's old apartment
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling Like stepping into Pee Wee\'s Playhouse, but with self-help books.

properties.name: Avalon theater/Electric Palace
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling Video games from Korea!

properties.name: Canton Inn
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling  Vicious redneck karaoke scene, but a nice place overall.

properties.name: Chin's Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling Chinese restaurant. Never eaten there, but fell in love with the sign the day I moved to Portland.

properties.name: Chinese Village
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling 520 SE 82nd Ave, Portland, 97216 Had my 32nd birthday there. Didn\'t eat the food. Those who did got sick. But the dining room is incredibly surreal.

properties.name: Creepy house
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling Ankeny Street, Portland, ORCreepy serial killer house where I went to an estate sale

properties.name: Darcelles XV
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling208 NW 3rd Avenue Portland, OR 97209Like stepping into a movie, or a time capsule full of old jokes.

properties.name: Eagles Lodge
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling13515 S.E. McLoughlin BlvdLike being in an episode of Laverne and Shirley.

properties.name: Juniors
properties.description: Posted by ScottysoulingLovely wallpaper.

properties.name: Knob Hill Pharmacy, now gone
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling  Heather Graham faked an epileptic fit here in the first few minutes of Drugstore Cowboy. I bought mustache wax on the last day it was open.

properties.name: Lost Meir & Frank xmas monorail
properties.description: Posted by ScottysoulingLast looks at the xmas monorail at Meir & Frank, which was in a space that\'s set to become condos.

properties.name: Pagoda Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling 3839 NE Broadway St, Portland, 97232One of the most beautiful Chinese restaurants in the country.

properties.name: Perm party
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling As part of Jeremy\'s 30th birthday party, Stephen agreed to have his hair permed.

properties.name: Suicide Club
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling  1905 NE MLK Blvd. Portland OR 97212I\'m always the oldest, lamest person here. But it\'s still incredibly fun.

properties.name: The Slammer
properties.description: Posted by ScottysoulingPortland\'s greatest xmas tradition.

properties.name: The Spare Room
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling4830 NE 42nd Ave, Portland, 97218 The best place in Portland to go to see old people dancing to live music. I once saw some hipsters playing strip poker at a table next to mine.

properties.name: Three Sisters (R.I.P.)
properties.description: Posted by ScottysoulingOne of the funnest/strangest bars in Portland, replaced with some generic nothingness.

properties.name: Tom hates the gays
properties.description: Posted by ScottysoulingWhen I went in there, they had bumper stickers supporting the constitutional amendment against gay marriage. Asshole. The nice/weird Wizard of Oz sign has always amused me, though.

properties.name: crazy former bank that's now an oil painting depository
properties.description: Posted by ScottysoulingNo explanation. But some nice old guys let me inside to look around.

properties.name: crazy topiary
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling  I love this eccentric touch at an otherwise unnoticeable house.

properties.name: crazy wig lady sighting
properties.description: Posted by ScottysoulingI only ever see her downtown. There\'s speculation about how many wigs are incorporated into this masterpiece.

properties.name: naked Slip and Slide party
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling Stumbled across this. Portland summers and public nudity go together.

properties.name: naked bike ride
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling Just saw them starting the ride.

properties.name: rooftop at Dekum building
properties.description: Posted by Scottysouling519 SW Third Street Hung out here one summer night when Bryan worked in the building.

properties.name: vine car
properties.description: Posted by ScottysoulingIt\'s been cleared away now.
